text: Sarpsborg is a city and municipality in Østfold county, Norway. In 2022, 59,038 people lived there. Economy: Operation of brewery: Until 2026, the Hansa-Borg brewery will keep on (doing business or) operating; It employs 45 people [full time].https://www.nettavisen.no/okonomi/bryggeriet-hansa-borg- legger-ned-i-sarpsborg-rundt-45-ansatte-rammes/s/5-95-2377089.
